name: 4Endurance Pro Collagen+ 90 caps
description_html:
Collagen helps you to regenerate your joints and cartilage and preserve the strength and health of your bones.

  • Hydrolyzed form for improved absorption
  • Better recovery, especially in mature years
  • Hyaluronic acid decreases joint wear and tear

Product Description

Collagen is a body's protein found in the skin, cartilage, ligaments, and bones. Initially, your body produces it by itself, but its production slows down with age. It is difficult to get a sufficient intake with regular nutrition, which is why it's important to use supplements. Collagen is especially effective in combination with vitamin C, which is essential for the production and synthesis of collagen.  

4Endurance Collagen+ includes vitamin C, essential for the synthesis of collagen, so you don't need to worry about finding it elsewhere.

Collagen may help you to regenerate joints and cartilage and preserve the strength of your bones. Hydrolyzed collagen is especially effective for older men, as studies clearly demonstrate that collagen peptides help to preserve body composition and muscle mass.

Collagen+ is especially suitable for runners, cyclists, and all active individuals who due to intense exercise regularly stress their joints, ligaments, and tissues. It is active individuals who most often suffer from cartilage wear and tear.

Hyaluronic acid is essential for the health of your cartilage and joints, and it may improve the elasticity of your joints and protect your cartilage.

Collagen you intake with food has poor absorption because your body is not able to absorb it from the digestive tract. Hydrolyzed collagen in Collagen+ is reduced to miniature particles, called peptides, that your body can absorb.

Product Benefits

  • Hydrolyzed collagen
  • Vitamin C improves collagen synthesis
  • Hyaluronic acid improves joint flexibility
  • Regenerate joints and cartilage
  • Increases strength and hypertrophy
  • Improves recovery, especially in older age
  • Improves skin, nail, and hair health and appearance

Recommended Use

Take 4 tablets per day. For best effect, take 2 tablets twice per day after a meal with a sufficient quantity of water.

Ingredients

 

Per serving (4 tablets)

 2 tablets

Hydrolyzed collagen

 2400 mg 1200 mg

Hyaluronic acid

 100 mg
 50 mg

Vitamin C

 80 mg (100% RDA)
  40 mg (50% RDA)

Food supplement. Ingredients: bulking agent: sorbitol, hydrolyzed collagen, sodium hyaluronate, anti-caking agent: magnesium stearate, vitamin C (ascorbic acid). May contain traces of milk, soy, nuts, eggs, celery, and mustard. Net quantity: 90 tablets.

name: 4Endurance Pro Absolute 84 caps
description_html:
Powerful VO2 max booster based on adaptogens and beta-alanine that helps you sustain higher intensities for longer and recover faster.

  • Boosts oxygen flow and VO2 max
  • Increases ATP energy levels
  • Reduces stress and muscle acidity
  • Accelerates blood flow
  • Speeds up recovery

Product Description

Absolute is a highly-efficient supplement designed to boost VO2 max, strength, and endurance. It helps endurance athletes improve performance faster and push their VO2 max beyond what training alone can achieve.

Formulated with high-potency adaptogens and beta-alanine, Absolute improves oxygen efficiency, enhances blood flow, and reduces muscle acidity — all essential for boosting endurance and performance.

Why adaptogens? They function in several ways. Their most important effect is to reduce sport-related stress, a common issue during endurance exercise. As stress levels rise, adaptogens help regulate them, ensuring your body’s cardiovascular system functions efficiently. This leads to improved vasodilation and higher VO2 max, supporting your ability to train harder and recover faster.

Combine Absolute with our VO2 max training plan for optimal results!

Product Benefits

  • Boosts oxygen flow and VO2 max
  • Increases ATP energy levels
  • Reduces stress and muscle acidity
  • Accelerates blood flow
  • Speeds up recovery
  • Reduces fatigue
  • Increases mental and physical strength

Recommended Use

On training day, take 4 capsules 30 to 45 minutes before exercise.

On rest day, take 2 capsules in the morning and 2 capsules in the afternoon.

The peak of taking Absolute is reached on the 21st day of use, so target the 21st day as the day of a match/race or important training session.

Instructions on how to combine different adaptogen products are found on this link.

After two cycles of taking the product, stop for at least 3 weeks.

WARNING

The use of this product is not recommended for people using beta-blockers or antihypertensives. In this case, please consult your doctor.

The use of this product is also discouraged with people who are prescribed antidepressants, antipsychotics, medications for schizophrenia, bipolar disorder and similar psychiatric medications.

Ingredients and Nutritional Values

  Per serving (4 capsules) %RDA
Beta-alanine 1500 mg *
Cordyceps mycelium extract 800 mg *
of which cordyceps acids 56 mg *
of which polysaccharides 80 mg *
ATPro Matrix 500 mg *
Ashwagandha root extract 150 mg *
Rhodiola root extract 150 mg *
Senactiv
 50 mg *
Chromium 200 µg 500

 *Daily value not established.

Food supplement. Ingredients: beta-alanine, cordyceps mycelium extract standardized to a minimum of 7% cordyceps acid and 10% polysaccharides, ATPro Matrix (calcium pyruvate, sodium salts of orthophosphoric acid, ribose), ashwagandha root extract (Withania Sominfera), rhodiola root extract (Rhodiola Rosea), anti-caking agent: magnesium salts of fatty acids, Senactiv (Panax notoginseng root extract, Roda Roxburghii fruit extract), chromium picolinate, Vegan capsule (colour: calcium carbonate). Bulking agent: magnesium salts of fatty acids. Net quantity: 84 capsules.

name: 4Endurance Pro Hydro BCAA (Raspberry/Tropical) 300 g
description_html:
Hydro BCAA is a sports drink based on branched-chain amino acids and electrolytes designed to fuel your short or fasted training sessions.

  • Prevents muscle breakdown
  • Replenishes electrolytes
  • Enhances recovery

Product Description

Hydro BCAA 4Endurance Pro is ideal for all your fasted training sessions or when you don't want to increase your sugar intake, as it allows you to protect your muscles, improve muscle recovery, and sustain optimal hydration without excessive calories.

The product is based on a proven 2:1:1 BCAA ratio and the highly efficient 4Endurance Pro Electrolyte Mix, which complement each other to create the perfect drink to support your muscles and body functions before, during, and after exercise.

BCAA IN 2:1:1 RATIO

Hydro BCAA contains 5 grams of branched-chain amino acids in the 2:1:1 ratio per serving — two parts leucine for one part isoleucine and one part valine.

This ratio boosts protein synthesis and protects muscles from breakdown during exercise, while also improving muscle recovery after exercise.

4ENDURANCE PRO ELECTROLYTE MIX

The widely popular and highly efficient 4Endurance Pro Electrolyte Mix returns in Hydro BCAA to sustain optimal hydration before, during, and after exercise.

This ratio is based on the most important minerals your body needs to function optimally: salt, magnesium, potassium, and calcium.

Use Hydro BCAA to hydrate and protect your muscles during short or fasted exercise!

Product Benefits

  • Prevents muscle breakdown
  • Replenishes electrolytes
  • Enhances recovery
  • Decreases muscle fatigue
  • Excellent solubility
  • No foaming

Recommended Use

Mix 1 scoop with 300–500 ml of water.

Consume 1 serving (1 scoop) per hour during exercise. Consume up to 4 servings per day. 

Ingredients

Per serving (1 scoop)

Daily Value

Energy

 91.8 kJ / 21.6 kcal
BCAA (2:1:1) 5,000 mg *

Salt

 40%

*Daily Value Not Established

Food Supplement: Flavored amino acid mix with electrolytes and sweetener. Ingredients: BCAA 2:1:1 (L-leucine, L-isoleucine, L-valine), salt, magnesium citrate, sodium chloride, acidity regulator (citric acid), calcium citrate, anti-caking agents (calcium silicate, tricalcium phosphate, silicon dioxide), maltodextrin, flavorings, sweetener (sucralose). Store in a cool, dry place. Do not exceed the recommended daily dose. Food supplements should not be used as a substitute for a varied diet. Keep out of reach of young children. Net quantity: 300 g (34 servings)

name: 4Endurance Pro Magnesium Direct 30 sachets
description_html:
Easy-to-consume magnesium supplement that includes two types of magnesium for high absorption without digestive issues. 

  • Supports muscle and nervous system function
  • Contributes to electrolyte balance
  • Reduces tiredness and fatigue

Product Description

Magnesium Direct is an easy-to-consume magnesium supplement for athletes, offering a variety of health and performance benefits.

The product is based on two forms of magnesium from natural sources that support your sports performance by reducing muscle cramps and mental fatigue, while also supporting normal muscle function and enhancing recovery. Additionally, magnesium supports bone health, improves protein synthesis, and enhances sleep.

Two types of magnesium

Magnesium Direct contains two types of magnesium that complement each other to maximize absorption and effectiveness.

  • Magnesium citrate is one of the most effective forms of magnesium and has significantly better absorption than most other types. It is derived from the magnesium salt of citric acid and has a high level of bioavailability (up to 90%).
  • Dead Sea magnesium oxide is a naturally sourced form of magnesium that helps maintain electrolyte balance.

Experience the convenience of Magnesium Direct — your easy, on-the-go supplement for better recovery and muscle relaxation! 

Product Benefits

  • Supports muscle and nervous system function
  • Contributes to electrolyte balance
  • Reduces tiredness and fatigue
  • Boosts ATP energy levels
  • Supports bone health
  • Improves protein synthesis
  • Enhances sleep

Recommended Use

Place the contents of 1 sachet on the tongue and allow it to dissolve.

Take after physical activity or about an hour before bedtime.

Excessive consumption may have a laxative effect. Not suitable for children under 16 years of age, pregnant women, or nursing mothers. Do not exceed the recommended daily amount or dose — one sachet.

Ingredients

 

Per serving (1 sachet)

 RDA

Magnesium

 400 mg 107%

as magnesium citrate

 140  mg 37%
as magnesium oxide 260 mg  69%

Food supplement. Ingredients (per 1 sachet): magnesium salts of citric acid (magnesium 140 mg - 37%*)and magnesium oxide (magnesium 260 mg - 69%); isomaltulose 215 mg; sweetener: xylitol; lemon fruit juice concentrate; orange fruit juice concentrate; natural orange flavoring; acidity regulator: citric acid; extract of bamboo (Bambusa vulgaris Schrad. ex J.C.Wendl.) shoots with 75% natural silica. *Reccomended daily value Net quantity: 30 sachets.

description_html:
A vitamin and mineral formula that provides all the micronutrients your body needs in one capsule.

  • Boosts your immune system
  • 100% RDA in one capsule
  • With 25 active ingredients

Product Description

Vit+Min is a vitamin and mineral formula designed for endurance athletes who want to get the total daily intake of micronutrients in a single capsule.

It contains 25 active ingredients (13 vitamins and 12 minerals), including vitamin B12 and iron. This allows you to boost your immune system and maintain electrolyte balance, improving your well-being and athletic performance.

Optimal doses

Vit+Min contains the exact doses of vitamins and minerals your body needs — 100% of daily requirements in a single capsule.

Excessive doses of vitamins and minerals are inefficient. Most will not be absorbed and will be eliminated with water, needlessly burdening your digestive system.

The exception is vitamin B12, which athletes require a lot more of. This vitamin is crucial to boost your energy metabolism.

100% daily intake of all micronutrients in a single capsule.

name: 4Endurance Pro Cardio Max 60 caps
description_html:
Cardio Max is a natural product to support the most important muscle in your body — your heart.

  • Supports the heart muscle
  • Supports the nervous system
  • Increases oxygen flow

Product Description

Cardio Max 4Endurance Pro provides everything your body needs for optimal cardiovascular and nervous system function in one product.

The product is based on the coenzyme Q10, quercetin, and other high-quality ingredients to support your heart muscle and the nervous system.

High Absorption Rate

The problem with most similar supplements on the market is that they have poor absorption rates because they do not contain the crucial ingredient to improve absorption — an ionophore.

An ionophore is a compound that helps micronutrients penetrate the cell and prevent viruses and free radicals from multiplying.

In Cardio Max, the ionophore function is performed by quercetin.

Micronutrients

Each Cardio Max capsule contains all the essential high-quality micronutrients to aid your normal cardio function. This makes the product even more well-rounded and purposeful!

Vitamin E is a powerful antioxidant that protects cells from oxidative stress!

Selenium protects cells from oxidative stress, supports the thyroid gland function, and contributes to normal immune function.

Vitamin B1 or thiamine contributes to the normal functioning of the nervous system and the normal functioning of the heart muscle.

Intense training puts your body under constant physical stress, so the optimal function of your cardiovascular and nervous systems is crucial for you.

Product Benefits

  • Supports the heart muscle
  • Supports the nervous system
  • Increases oxygen flow
  • Protects cells from oxidative stress
  • Boosts the immune system
  • Reduces fatigue

Recommended use

Take 1 capsule daily with water, preferably in the morning after a meal.

Coenzyme Q10 and vitamin E are not water soluble, but lipophilic (dissolved in lipids), so always consume after meals! This ensures that a sufficient amount of coenzyme Q10 and vitamin E passes into the blood and can subsequently be used by the body.

ATTENTION! 

Not suitable for individuals taking anti-clotting medication such as Warfarin.

Taking Coenzyme Q10 in diabetic patients may reduce tissue resistance to insulin, so consult your doctor before use!

Do not take this product if you regularly take antacids (e.g. Pantoprazole or Protonix or any similar drug to reduce stomach acid)!

description_text: Cardio Max is a natural product to support the most important muscle in your body — your heart. Supports the heart muscle Supports the nervous system Increases oxygen flow Product Description Cardio Max 4Endurance Pro provides everything your body needs for optimal cardiovascular and nervous system function in one product. High Absorption Rate The problem with most similar supplements on the market is that they have poor absorption rates because they do not contain the crucial ingredient to improve absorption — an ionophore. An ionophore is a compound that helps micronutrients penetrate the cell and prevent viruses and free radicals from multiplying. In Cardio Max, the ionophore function is performed by quercetin. Micronutrients Each Cardio Max capsule contains all the essential high-quality micronutrients to aid your normal cardio function. This makes the product even more well-rounded and purposeful! Vitamin E is a powerful antioxidant that protects cells from oxidative stress! Selenium protects cells from oxidative stress, supports the thyroid gland function, and contributes to normal immune function. Vitamin B1 or thiamine contributes to the normal functioning of the nervous system and the normal functioning of the heart muscle. Intense training puts your body under constant physical stress, so the optimal function of your cardiovascular and nervous systems is crucial for you. Product Benefits Supports the heart muscle Supports the nervous system Increases oxygen flow Protects cells from oxidative stress Boosts the immune system Reduces fatigue Recommended use Take 1 capsule daily with water, preferably in the morning after a meal . name: 4Endurance Pro Nitro Boost 180 g Fruit Punch
4Endurance Pro Nitrates+ 90 caps
description_html:
Premium nitrate formula, combining 3 nitrate sources with L-arginine that increases endurance and power output in sprints.

  • Improves blood flow
  • Reduces oxygen cost of exercise
  • Delays fatigue during exercise
  • Increases time to exhaustion
  • Supports faster recovery

Product Description

Nitrates+ is a highly-efficient supplement designed to increase endurance. By widening your blood vessels, it allows more oxygen and nutrients to feed your muscles, resulting in a noticeable performance boost.

Combining three natural nitrate sources — beetroot, red spinach, and arugula (rocket) extracts — with L-arginine HCL, Nitrates+ enhances nitric oxide production. This results in improved blood flow, more efficient oxygen utilization (indirectly boosting VO2 max), and reduced fatigue.

Why L-Arginine HCL? Arginine HCL is a key amino acid involved in nitric oxide synthesis, further boosting circulation and enhancing oxygen delivery during training.

Increase endurance by delivering more oxygen to your muscles, faster!

Product Benefits

  • Improves blood flow
  • Reduces oxygen cost of exercise
  • Delays fatigue during exercise
  • Increases time to exhaustion
  • Supports faster recovery

Recommended Use

Take 3 capsules with water approximately 30 minutes before exercise.

On non-training days, take 3 capsules in the first half of the day.

Attention! People who take medication for heart conditions or have an allergy to nitrates or nitrites should not take this product!

name: 4Endurance Pro Alpha Boost 126 caps
description_html:
Alpha Boost is a natural testosterone-boosting formula based on amino acids, adaptogens, minerals, and shilajit to support men's well-being.

  • Boosts testosterone levels
  • Improves recovery and performance
  • Boosts ATP energy levels

Product Description

Alpha Boost 4Endurance Pro is a natural testosterone booster that increases the levels of this important hormone, leading to better recovery, higher energy levels, increased muscle mass, and improved male libido.

Alpha Boost contains crucial minerals, amino acids, and the full support of carefully selected adaptogens — no fillers, no cheap ingredients, only the best ingredients in optimal doses.

Amino acids

Alpha Boost contains L-Ornithine and Asparatic Acid (DAA).

L-Ornithine has several roles including supporting strength, endurance, and muscle recovery, reducing stress levels, and promoting better sleep.

DAA can improve testosterone levels, especially in inactive individuals and those with lower levels of this hormone.

Adaptogens

Adaptogens increase your body's ability to manage stress caused by exercise.

Consequently, your body is better suited for efforts, has more strength, recovers faster, and is generally better prepared for intense exercise.

Some adaptogens increase the body's natural testosterone production and reduce the stress hormone cortisol.

Alpha Boost contains only the best and carefully selected adaptogens to help the body cope with stress and begin to function optimally. 

Ashwagandha reduces stress and benefits cognitive functions, VO2 max, psychophysical well-being, and energy levels.

Ashwagandha can also achieve an average increase in testosterone of about 15% and an 18% increase in DHEA (a hormone that helps produce other hormones, including testosterone) in men over 40.

Fenusterols Fenugreek in patented and proven 600 mg dosages with saponins has substantial anabolic and androgenic effects, influencing testosterone levels and muscle performance. Fenugreek with creatine supplementation also improves creatine uptake without requiring a high carbohydrate intake.

Suma Root is an adaptogen with a long history of use. The root (active ingredient) increases energy levels and reduces stress and tension. It is also believed that the root is a potent aphrodisiac.

Black Maca is a natural aphrodisiac that may boost your libido.

Red Ginseng is an adaptogen that increases alertness and life energy and reduces exercise-induced stress. In sports, ginseng increases oxygen flow, endurance, and focus.

Cordyceps Sinesis reduces fatigue and improves oxygen utilization during exercise.

Ginseng improves your alertness, increases energy levels, and helps your body to combat stress.

Minerals

Alpha Boost contains all the essential male minerals: zinc citrate, boron, and selenium.

Zinc supports healthy testosterone levels, fertility, immune system, and protein synthesis. 

Boron supports healthy testosterone levels and with Selenium contributes to normal spermatogenesis and cell protection.

Shilajit

Shilajit is a sediment of plants and rocks that contains more than eighty-five minerals and trace elements the human body needs for optimal functioning. It is also the only mineral with adaptogenic properties beneficial to men's well-being. 

Support healthy testosterone levels and athletic performance with this advanced blend of amino acids, minerals, high-quality adaptogens, and Shijalit.

Product Benefits

  • Boosts testosterone levels
  • Improves recovery and performance
  • Boosts ATP energy levels
  • Manages stress caused by exercise
  • Boosts immune system
  • Improve exercise performance
  • Increases physical endurance

Recommended Use

Take 6 capsules daily, 3 in the morning and 3 in the evening, preferably on an empty stomach.

ATTENTION: This product is intended for men only. The product does not contain substances prohibited in sport, however, it is not recommended for tested athletes.

The product is not suitable for people on psychiatric medication such as antidepressants, medication for bipolar disorder, or antipsychotics.

The product is not suitable for individuals taking Anticoagulants such as Warfarin because it might slow blood clotting.

description_html:
100% natural vitamin C with acerola and rosehip is the perfect boost for your immune system!

  • Boosts your immune system
  • Increases ATP energy levels
  • Protect cells from oxidative stress

Product Description

Natural Vitamin C 4Endurance is a potent supplement combining acerola and rosehip to boost your immune system, increase ATP energy levels, and protect cells from oxidative stress, making it ideal for endurance athletes.

Natural sources of vitamin C

Acerola and rosehip are two excellent natural sources of vitamin C. These ingredients are powerful antioxidants that help protect cells from damage caused by free radicals, which are produced in greater amounts during extended periods of endurance exercise. 

Vitamin C from acerola and rosehip is essential for collagen synthesis and production, aiding in the repair and recovery of tissues, including muscles, tendons, and ligaments. Additionally, they ensure excellent absorption and slow release to maintain constant vitamin C levels in the body.

Support your body’s immune system with the power of Natural Vitamin C!

Product Benefits

  • Boosts immune system
  • Increases ATP energy levels
  • Protects cells from oxidative stress 
  • Contributes to collagen production
  • Reduces muscle cramps
  • Strong antioxidant
  • Preserve cartilage health 

Recommended Use

Take one to two capsules daily with a meal and a sufficient quantity of water.

Ingredients

Food supplement. name: 4Endurance Pro Vitamin B Complex 90 caps
description_html:
Vitamin B Complex is especially suitable for you, the athlete who has an increased need for energy.

  • Raise your energy levels
  • Take care of your nervous system
  • Reduce daily stress

Product Description

Vitamin B Complex 4Endurance Pro with 300% B-Complex vitamins with added choline, inositol, and PABA is especially important for you, the endurance athlete, as you are much more dependent than others on increased energy expenditure, faster production (and also deterioration) of red blood cells and a stressed nervous system.

The product contains choline, which is the main transmitter of signals in the form of nerve stimulation to the brain. It affects your memory, concentration and well-being, and prevents you from hitting a "wall" or running out of energy later on. It also allows you to have normal coordination and balance, which is especially important for athletes.

Vitamin B Complex allows you to stay focused even during long and strenuous workouts when stress hormones and inflammatory factors are particularly high.

This includes vitamin B6, which plays a key role in the mental and general well-being of the athlete, and vitamin B12, which gives the body the energy it needs.

Inositol and PABA are important signalling substances involved in various biochemical processes. These include the regulation of blood sugar and the normalization of hormonal balance.

Vitamin B12 is an essential vitamin that your body needs but cannot produce on its own. It supports the normal functioning of nerve cells and is necessary for the production of red blood cells. Vegetarians and vegans are particularly deficient in it, as they cannot get it into their bodies through natural foods.

Products Benefits

  • Increases energy levels
  • Improves stress response
  • Reduces fatigue
  • Improves psychophysical well-being
  • Ensures normal energy conversion
  • Important link in DNA synthesis
  • With PABA and Inositol

Recommened Use

Take one capsule per day, ideally between meals in the first half of the day.

It affects your memory, concentration and well-being, and prevents you from hitting a "wall" or running out of energy later on. It also allows you to have normal coordination and balance, which is especially important for athletes.   • Boosts the cardiovascular system
  • Improves brain health

Product Description

TG Omega 3 4Endurance Pro is a naturally obtained and highly absorbable source of omega-3 fatty acids with vitamin E, perfect for athletes who want to support their athletic performance.

Each capsule contains 1000 mg of omega-3 fatty acids, including 180 mg of EPA, 120 mg of DHA, and 10 mg of vitamin E. This supplement is especially beneficial for enhancing cardiovascular health, boosting brain function, and protecting cells from oxidative stress.

Why triglyceride omega-3?

Triglyceride forms of omega-3 fatty acids are naturally obtained from small fish, allowing for better absorption by the body. They are also more easily integrated into cell membranes, enhancing their usability.

Moreover, the triglyceride omega-3 fatty acids have demonstrated a greater ability to elevate blood levels of omega-3 fatty acids, which can contribute to improved overall health outcomes.

Take care of the health of your cardiovascular system and your brain with TG Omega 3 4Endurance Pro!

name: 4Endurance Pro Potassium Citrate 90 caps
description_html:
Potassium is the electrolyte that athletes are usually most deficient in and is crucial for many processes inside your body.

  • Supports normal muscle function
  • Prevents cramps during intense exercise
  • Calms the brain and improves sleep

Product Description

Potassium Citrate 4Endurance Pro contains 200 mg of potassium citrate. It is the ideal source of potassium for athletes, as it contains potassium in its most bio-available form.

Potassium is one of the most important electrolytes inside your body, and athletes often suffer from its deficiency. This leads to muscle cramps and discomfort during exercise.

Potassium supports regular cell function. Potassium deficiency may cause muscle and nervous system dysfunction, making it impossible for you to participate in sports.  

Potassium Citrate 4Endurance Pro provides a high dose of potassium and the highest absorption rates.

Product Benefits

  • Helps with hydration
  • Prevents muscle cramps
  • Maintains fluid balance
  • Support normal muscle function
  • Stimulates nerve impulses
  • Provides oxygen to the brain
  • Preserve regular blood pressure

Recommended Use

Take 1 capsule with a meal. Especially in a period of increased physical activity. 

Try to avoid taking it in combination with caffeine, as caffeine hinders the absorption of potassium in your body.

name: 4Endurance Pro Glutamine
description_html:
100% pure fermented L-glutamine — the key amino acid for muscle recovery and gut support.

  • Improves muscle recovery
  • Enhances protein and glycogen synthesis
  • Prevents muscle breakdown

Product Description

Glutamine 4Endurance Pro is designed for endurance athletes and individuals engaging in intense or prolonged physical activity — especially during periods of caloric deficit, heavy training loads, or physical stress.

Glutamine is a key amino acid that helps rebuild muscle fibers, supports gut health, and strengthens the immune system. During periods of physical stress, your body may not produce enough to cover increased needs — which is where supplementation will make a difference.

What Is Glutamine?

Glutamine is a naturally produced amino acid that becomes conditionally essential under physical stress, such as during intense training or caloric restriction. It plays a role in many critical functions, from muscle regeneration to maintaining gut integrity.

Supplementing with glutamine helps support:

  • Faster muscle recovery
  • Protein and glycogen synthesis
  • Immune system maintenance
  • Gut health and integrity

Why Choose Glutamine 4Endurance Pro?

Unlike standard glutamine supplements, Glutamine 4Endurance Pro uses a fermented source, ensuring:

  • Better absorption
  • Improved digestibility
  • No added fillers or artificial ingredients

Choose 100% fermented glutamine for better recovery and gut support!

Product Benefits

  • Improves muscle recovery
  • Enhances protein and glycogen synthesis
  • Prevents muscle breakdown
  • Strengthens immune function
  • Supports gut health
  • 100% fermented glutamine

Recommended Use

Mix 1 scoop with water. Take up to 3 scoops per day.

💡 Pro tip!

If you are in a caloric deficit:

  • Take 1 scoop before and 1 scoop after exercise.
  • On rest days, take 1 scoop before breakfast and 1 scoop before bed.

If you are in caloric surplus:

  • Take 1 scoop after exercise.
  • On rest days, take 1 scoop before breakfast or before bed.

Ingredients

Food supplement. Ingredients: 100% pure fermented L-glutamine. Store in a cool, dry place. Net quantity: 500 g.

name: Nduranz Nrgy Drink 45 1200 g (Watermelon)
description_html:
High-performance isotonic sports drink containing an advanced electrolyte mix and 45 grams of carbohydrates per serving that is easy on the stomach.

✔ Optimized for high energy intake
✔ Preserves glycogen stores
✔ Sustains optimal hydration
✔ Prevents muscle cramps
✔ No digestive issues

Product Description

Nrgy Drink 45 is the optimal fuel for high-performance athletes who need a high carbohydrate intake and optimal hydration without unnecessary ingredients and digestive issues.

Each serving delivers 45 grams of carbohydrates using the scientifically proven 1:0.8 glucose to fructose ratio and contains the Nduranz Electrolyte Mix that replicates exactly what you lose through sweat.

CARBOHYDRATE RATIO

Nrgy Drink 45 is based on the Nduranz carbohydrate ratio, a 1:0.8 ratio between glucose (maltodextrin) and fructose.

It is scientifically proven to be the optimal ratio, which allows the highest absorption of 90 grams of carbohydrates per hour without burdening your digestive system and causing digestive issues.

ELECTROLYTE MIX

Nrgy Drink 45 contains the Nduranz Electrolyte Mix, an advanced mix of minerals that matches the electrolytes you lose with sweat.

This mix enables optimal hydration during intense exercise without causing digestive issues, which are a common downside of many electrolyte formulas.

COMBINING WITH OTHER FUELING PRODUCTS

For best results, combine Nrgy Drink 45 with other Nduranz fueling products. They all use the same carbohydrate ratio, and those that include electrolytes share the same Nduranz Electrolyte Mix — minimizing digestive issues.

INFORMED SPORT CERTIFIED

Every batch of Nrgy Drink 45 is tested for banned substances under the Informed Sport program. That means you can fuel with confidence — your performance stays clean and your reputation safe.

Keep your energy high and hydration on point with Nrgy Drink 45!

Nrgy Drink 45 vs. Nrgy Drink 90

Nrgy Drink 90 is a sports drink adapted for higher energy intake. Although it offers the same amount of CHO per scoop (22.5 g) as Nrgy Drink 45, the amount of electrolytes and the strength of the taste are adapted to the higher amount in a single bottle.

This way, Nrgy Drink 90 ensures that you get just the right amount of electrolytes in one serving (4 scoops) and a suitably strong taste.

If you were to mix 2 portions of Nrgy Drink 45 (4 scoops) in a bidon, you would have double the amount of electrolytes in one bottle and a drink with an extremely strong taste. The former, in particular, opens up the possibility of digestive problems. 

Nrgy Drink 90 also allows you to intake more CHO with less fluid, as you can intake 90 grams with just 500 ml of water. Nrgy Drink 45 requires 1000 ml of water for an intake of 90 grams. 

Product Benefits

  • Optimized for high energy intake
  • Sustains optimal hydration
  • No digestive issues
  • With or without citric acid
  • Prevents muscle cramps
  • Preserve glycogen stores
  • Simplifies fueling
  • No artificial sweeteners
  • Informed sport certified

Recommended Use

Consume 1 to 2 servings per hour of intense exercise.

For 1 serving, mix 2 scoops with 500 ml of water (in hot conditions 750 ml).

Use the Nduranz Fuel Calculator to easily estimate your required energy intake during exercise.

name: Nduranz Nrgy Drink 90 Limited 1200 g (Cucumber Lime)
description_html:
High-carb sports drink containing 90 grams of carbohydrates and an advanced electrolyte mix per serving that is easy on the stomach.

✔ Max carbohydrate dose in a single serving
✔ Preserves glycogen stores
✔ Sustains optimal hydration
✔ Prevents muscle cramps
✔ No digestive issues

Product Description

Nrgy Drink 90 is designed for high-performance athletes who fuel at 90 g of carbs or more per hour and want to do it efficiently — with less fluid and zero digestive issues.

Each serving delivers 90 grams of carbohydrates in just 1 bottle using the scientifically proven 1:0.8 glucose to fructose ratio and contains the Nduranz Electrolyte Mix that replicates exactly what you lose through sweat.

It’s the most effective way to hit your fueling targets with just 500 ml of water without being too sweet or upsetting your stomach. Ideal for races, cooler conditions, and any situation where drinking more simply isn’t an option.

CARBOHYDRATE RATIO

Nrgy Drink 90 is based on the Nduranz Carbohydrate Ratio, a 1:0.8 ratio between glucose (maltodextrin) and fructose.

It is scientifically proven to be the optimal ratio, which allows the highest absorption of 90 grams of carbohydrates per hour without burdening your digestive system and causing digestive issues.

ELECTROLYTE MIX

Nrgy Drink 90 contains the Nduranz Electrolyte Mix, an advanced mix of minerals that matches the electrolytes you lose with sweat.

This mix enables optimal hydration during intense exercise without causing digestive issues, which are a common downside of many electrolyte formulas.

COMBINING WITH OTHER FUELING PRODUCTS

For best results, combine Nrgy Drink 90 with other Nduranz fueling products. They all use the same carbohydrate ratio, and those that include electrolytes share the same Nduranz Electrolyte Mix — minimizing digestive issues.

Nrgy Drink 90 delivers max energy intake with minimal fluid! Designed for races and extreme endurance challenges. 

Nrgy Drink 45 vs. Nrgy Drink 90

Nrgy Drink 90 is a sports drink adapted for higher energy intake. Although it offers the same amount of CHO per scoop (22.5 g) as Nrgy Drink, the amount of electrolytes and the strength of the taste are adapted to the higher amount in a single bottle.

This way, Nrgy Drink 90 ensures that you get just the right amount of electrolytes in one serving (4 scoops) and a suitably strong taste.

If you were to mix 2 portions of Nrgy Drink 45 (4 scoops) in a bottle, you would have double the amount of electrolytes in one bottle and a drink with an extremely strong taste. The former, in particular, opens up the possibility of digestive problems. 

Nrgy Drink 90 also allows you to intake more CHO with less fluid, as you can intake 90 grams with just 500 ml of water. Nrgy Drink requires 1000 ml of water for an intake of 90 grams.

Product Benefits

  • Max carbohydrate dose in a single serving
  • Preserves glycogen stores
  • Sustains optimal hydration
  • Prevents muscle cramps
  • No digestive issues
  • More energy with less fluid
  • Simplifies fueling
  • No artificial sweeteners

Recommended Use

Consume 1 serving per hour of intense exercise.

For one serving, mix 4 scoops with 500 ml of water and drink during exercise.

TIP: In hot conditions, you can use 750 ml of water.

Use the Nduranz Fuel Calculator to easily estimate your required energy intake during exercise.

name: 4Endurance Pro Adaptogen Fuse 60 caps
description_html:
Adaptogen Fuse is a blend of high-quality adaptogens that provides all the benefits of these amazing plants in a single product.

  • Boosts VO2 max
  • Reduces stress
  • Enhances physical and mental strength

Product Description

Adaptogen Fuse is a holistic adaptogenic formula for athletes looking for all the adaptogen benefits in one product. 

This blend of high-quality adaptogens will boost your VO2 max, improve your strength and endurance, and help you better manage everyday stress.

Adaptogens

Adaptogen Fuse contains carefully selected adaptogens, each with a specific purpose. Inside you'll find:

  • Ashwagandha
  • Rhodiola
  • Ginseng (Siberian, Brazilian, Ginseng Root)
  • Schisandra

Adaptogen benefits

The most important benefits of adaptogens are their ability to improve VO2 max, reduce exercise-induced stress, and adapt your body to stressful situations (training, racing etc.).

During exercise or heavy work (both physical and mental), the stress factors increase and adaptogens help you reduce them. Three types of ginseng and schisandra will also increase your well-being and boost your immune system.

Ashwagandha — This powerful adaptogen increases the ratio between testosterone and cortisol and reduces fatigue during athletic activity. It improves recovery and boosts your immune system and the ability to deal with everyday challenges.

Rhodiola — A natural stimulant that helps you boost VO2 max levels. It also protects your body from stress, reduces fatigue, increases physical and mental strength, and improves mental processes.

Schisandra — A powerful antioxidant used to manage stress levels and reduce fatigue, as well as to increase longevity and prevent insomnia.

Siberian ginseng — Improves physical endurance, focus, and mental alertness, similar to caffeine, but without a sudden drop in energy levels.

Brasilian ginseng (Suma) — Increases energy levels and reduces stress and tension.

Ginseng (Panax Ginseng) — Increases oxygen flow, endurance, and focus. It also reduces exercise-induced stress.

Get all the amazing benefits of high-quality adaptogens in a single product with Adaptogen Fuse!

Product Benefits

  • Boosts VO2 max
  • Reduces stress
  • Enhances physical and mental strength
  • Improves recovery
  • Increases oxygen flow
  • Improves testosterone-to-cortisol ratio

Recommended Use

Take 2 capsules per day with a sufficient quantity of water. Preferably, 1 capsule in the first half and 1 capsule in the second half of the day. 

Adaptogens need to load in the body and do not have an immediate effect.

The first visible results of taking the product are visible after about 7-10 days.

Instructions on how to combine different adaptogen products are found on this link.

After three months of taking the product, it is recommended to take a 3-4 week break.

Attention!

The product is not suitable for people treated with sedatives, antipsychotics, drugs for bipolar disorder, antidepressants, and similar psychiatric drugs.
